```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load

```{r load}
library(tidyverse)

life_exp <- read.csv("./data/graph_data_life_exp.csv")
```

## Graph

```{r graph, fig.height = 2, fig.width = 3.5}
ggplot(life_exp, aes(x = fct_rev(country), y = life_exp, fill = country)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "", y = "Life expectancy (years)") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
